title: Remove the surrender button in ranked.
body:
It literally serves no point whatsoever, sure in normals its good because if the game gets too long and auntie comes around or something then you can surrender and stop the game, but in ranked you only play if you know that auntie ISNT coming round and that you have time to do a whole game.

The surrender option is literally a 'stay in bronze or not' button, if you click yes then you can kiss anything above silver goodbye. So i vote we remove it from ranked to stop idiots who cant read the 'stay in bronze' written over the surrender button, pressing it.

that is all.

replies.body:
lmao I surrender like 25% of my games and I still managed to get gold.
saying shit like "surrendering is what keeps you in bronze" is what keeps you in bronze.
also being a trashlord.

The surrender button lets you abandon a hopeless game, so you can go back into matchmaking to find another game.
That 'stay in bronze' button might save you a good 20 minutes of your time, in which you can go and win a game.

Riot will never delete the surrender button in ranked, because it is the only way to ensure a loss. I noticed you logged onto your smurf to post this because you realized how dumb it sounds. Not only does it let a team abandon a pointless waste of time in the end sometimes, (which I never do) but it actually is used by the pros to keep themselves in low ELO on stream. They will play well, not intentionally feed but actually wreck so it is entertaining, and then surrender so they don't climb. Surrendering isn't against the rules, but intent feeding is. So yeah, if Riot has any smarts at all they would keep the surrender button.

Scoreboard: 50 v 2 
"no dont surrender we can still win this!1!!11!1"

Please don't remove the surrender button then I can't enjoy the pleasure of a player spamming surrender in ranked anymore like every 3 minutes or something :'( 

Anyways the surrender option can be annoying if a player rages and just keep spamming it HOWEVER sometimes you get one of those games where its unwinnable and you just want to be let free from a tilt game.

EU-West totally agrees. You can win so many hopeless games and I am in Plat 2 EUW. Just watch how I solo defend that Nexus 1vs4 as Malz while Shyvanna splitpushed into their base.
